meanings: disturbance, fuss, uproar, commotion, (informal) rumpus, (informal) ruckus, (literary) tumult

vlive.korean: [큐뉴우유... 도자기를 빚는다... 우당탕탕 소동이 일어난 큐뉴우유의 도자기 체험!] [Q New Milk... [Experiencing pottery making with a bang!] View video THE BOYZ : 큐뉴우유(Q_NEW_MILK) EP_2

vlive.korean: 아시죠? 제 옷에 벌레가 붙어서 한바탕 소동이 일어났던 거. Do you remember? There was a bug on my shirt, so there was a big commotion. 듣기 View video MADTOWN : 준이의 영상통화 연결중...
vlive.english: Do you remember? There was a bug on my shirt, so there was a big commotion.
